# BrightTools Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Graphics and 3D-heavy Next.js website with React Three Fiber for 3D content.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Three Fiber / Three.js for 3D graphics
- Framer Motion for animations

## Development Guidelines
- Optimize for graphics-heavy content
- Use modern React patterns with hooks
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Ensure performance optimization for 3D scenes
